text:
Popspots | Software Developer | Austin, TX | ONSITE | Full-time | https://getpopspots.com

Here at Popspots, we’re building the future of grocery retail. Using our network of in-store IoT hardware and AI, we streamline product management for retailers and give brands access to their customers at the point-of-purchase. We care deeply about what we do, and we have a lot of fun doing it. We value honesty, collaboration, and an eagerness to learn and improve.

We’re looking to add a Software Developer to our engineering team. This role is for someone with a passion for design, collaboration, and problem-solving. We’re a small company (14 employees), so everyone here is an essential contributor. We take pride in our work, are comfortable with change, and aren’t afraid to step outside of our job descriptions.

If you love learning new skills and taking the initiative, check out our full job post at: https://drive.google.com/a/getpopspots.com/file/d/181cWc6hzQ...
